subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Rasheed Wallace made up for a technical foul in the fourth quarter last night by scoring 6 of his season-high 28 points late in the game, helping the host Detroit Pistons defeat the Toronto Raptors, 98-92.
snippet: Rasheed Wallace made up for a technical foul in the fourth quarter last night by scoring 6 of his season-high 28 points late in the game, helping the host Detroit Pistons defeat the Toronto Raptors, 98-92.
